meanings.definition: Tending to digress or wander off course.
meanings.sent1: Her excursive thoughts often led her away from the main topic.
meanings.sent2: The excursive path through the forest was full of surprises.
meanings.sent3: His excursive storytelling made everyone laugh at the unexpected twists.
meanings.sent4: The excursive river meandered through the valley, exploring every corner.
meanings.sent5: The excursive clouds drifted aimlessly across the sky, changing shapes constantly.
